main event: A 10-year-old boy in Spotswood, New Jersey saw a white object that turned red and performed an 'arc-shaped' descent before going straight up in the sky in March 1967.
interesting points: The object was first white, then turned red.
It performed an 'arc-shaped' descent from vertical to horizontal, then went straight up.
The witness is a 10-year-old boy who stated that he and his friends have a club that discusses UFOs.
The photos taken of the object did not come out.
The witness is concerned that the object may have actually been factory equipment in the area, as there are factory-like lights nearby.
sighted object: a white object that turned red
photographs: no, the photos did not turn out
